title: Knight's Tournament Grounds Adventure #10
goal: Solve the puzzles, achieve the main objective, and escape.

rooms.name: Tournament Armory
rooms.description: A stone chamber filled with suits of armor, shields, and weapons. Sunlight streams through narrow windows, illuminating dust motes in the air. The smell of oil and metal fills the room. Colorful heraldic banners hang from the walls, each bearing a different knight's coat of arms.

items.name: wooden weapon rack
items.description: A sturdy rack holding various tournament weapons - lances, swords, and maces

items.name: iron key
items.description: A heavy iron key with a lion emblem on the handle

items.name: suit of armor on stand
items.description: A complete suit of plate armor standing at attention, holding a shield

items.name: reinforced storage chest
items.description: A large wooden chest bound with iron straps and a heavy lock

items.name: tournament registry scroll
items.description: An official scroll listing the knights competing in the tournament
items.text: GRAND TOURNAMENT REGISTRY - Year 1485. Competing Knights: Sir Aldric the Bold (Red Dragon), Sir Brennan of Ashford (Golden Lion), Sir Cedric the Just (Silver Falcon), Sir Dorian Blackwood (Black Raven). Grand Champion: Sir Aldric the Bold. Remember: The champion's symbol unlocks the greatest treasures.

items.name: bronze key
items.description: A small bronze key with intricate engravings

items.name: equipment cabinet
items.description: A tall cabinet with multiple compartments for storing tournament gear

items.name: herald's announcement
items.description: A notice written by the tournament herald
items.text: By order of the King: The Grand Tournament shall commence in the year of our Lord 1485. All knights must register their heraldic symbols. The champion shall be granted access to the Hall of Victory.

items.name: silver key
items.description: A polished silver key that gleams in the light

items.name: red dragon banner
items.description: A crimson banner displaying a fierce red dragon
items.text: Heraldic Banner - Sir Aldric the Bold: Red Dragon on crimson field. Victor of fifteen tournaments. Known for courage and honor.

items.name: golden lion banner
items.description: A yellow banner showing a majestic golden lion
items.text: Heraldic Banner - Sir Brennan of Ashford: Golden Lion on yellow field. Defender of the realm. Skilled in mounted combat.

items.name: silver falcon banner
items.description: A white banner depicting a silver falcon in flight
items.text: Heraldic Banner - Sir Cedric the Just: Silver Falcon on white field. Known for fairness and wisdom. Champion of the common folk.

items.name: black raven banner
items.description: A dark banner showing a black raven
items.text: Heraldic Banner - Sir Dorian Blackwood: Black Raven on dark field. Master strategist. Undefeated in three consecutive tournaments.

items.name: heavy oak door
items.description: A reinforced door leading out to the tournament field. It has a complex lock mechanism.

rooms.name: Tournament Field
rooms.description: A vast open field surrounded by wooden viewing stands decorated with colorful pennants. The jousting lane runs down the center, marked by wooden barriers. A scoring table sits near the stands, covered with parchments and records. To the north stands an ornate gateway leading to the Champion's Hall.

items.name: tournament scoring table
items.description: A table covered with tournament records, score sheets, and official documents

items.name: final tournament scores
items.description: The official scoring record from the grand tournament
items.text: FINAL SCORES - Grand Tournament 1485: Sir Aldric the Bold: 47 points (CHAMPION), Sir Dorian Blackwood: 43 points, Sir Brennan of Ashford: 38 points, Sir Cedric the Just: 35 points. The champion's heraldry shall be honored in the Hall of Victory.

items.name: wooden viewing stands
items.description: Tiered wooden benches where spectators watch the tournament

items.name: spectator's journal
items.description: A small journal left behind by a tournament spectator
items.text: What an exciting tournament! Sir Aldric truly deserved his victory. I heard the guards say that to enter the Champion's Hall, one must know: Who won the tournament? What is the champion's heraldic symbol? Where does the victor's banner hang?

items.name: wooden jousting barrier
items.description: A long wooden fence dividing the jousting lane

items.name: locked trophy case
items.description: A glass case displaying tournament trophies and medals

items.name: champion's medal
items.description: A golden medal engraved with a red dragon, awarded to the tournament champion

items.name: tall pennant pole
items.description: A pole flying colorful tournament pennants
items.text: The pennants display the colors of all competing knights. At the very top flies the red dragon banner of Sir Aldric, marking him as champion. The banner hangs in the Hall of Victory as tradition dictates.

items.name: ornate champion's gate
items.description: A magnificent gateway adorned with carved lions and dragons. A bronze plaque displays three questions that must be answered to proceed.

password_questions.question: Who won the grand tournament?
password_questions.hint: Check the tournament registry scroll and the final scores

password_questions.question: What is the champion's heraldic symbol?
password_questions.hint: Look at the banners in the armory and the champion's information

password_questions.question: Where does the victor's banner hang?
password_questions.hint: Read the spectator's journal and the pennant pole description

rooms.name: Champion's Hall of Victory
rooms.description: A magnificent hall with vaulted ceilings and stained glass windows depicting legendary knights. The walls are lined with shields and banners of past champions. In the center, on a marble pedestal, rests the Tournament Crown - a golden circlet studded with rubies. Torches cast a warm glow over the hall, and the air is filled with the weight of history and honor.

items.name: Tournament Crown
items.description: A magnificent golden crown awarded to the grand champion, symbolizing ultimate victory and honor

items.name: marble pedestal
items.description: A pristine white marble pedestal holding the Tournament Crown

items.name: wall of champion shields
items.description: Dozens of shields belonging to past tournament champions, each telling a story of valor
items.text: The shields represent centuries of tournament tradition. Each champion's heraldry is preserved here for eternity. Sir Aldric's red dragon shield now joins this honored collection.

items.name: stained glass windows
items.description: Beautiful windows depicting knights in combat, their armor gleaming in colored light

rooms.win_message: You have reached the Champion's Hall of Victory! As you approach the Tournament Crown, the hall fills with the ethereal sound of trumpets. You have proven yourself worthy by solving the challenges of the tournament grounds. The crown glows with an inner light, acknowledging your achievement. You are victorious! You win!
